text: Dang youren dui tamen shuo:“Nimen lai zunxing an la suo jiang shi de jingdian [“gulanjing”] ba!” Tamen jiu shuo:“Bu, women zhi zunxing women faxian women de zuxian suo zunxing de yijiao.” Yaoshi emo zhaohuan tamen qu shou huo yu de xingfa,[nandao tamen ye yao zunxing tamen de zuxian de yijiao ma?]
